locations: de, germany, north rhine-westphalia, dortmund, 44147, kanalstraße, 25, 51.5291395, 7.441158129409318
short_description: abp induction is a die casting & tool manufacturer based in dortmund, germany.
long_description: abp induction is a manufacturer of industrial induction heating and melting equipment. in over 100 years of serving the metal casting and forging industries, our enthusiasm for molten metal has always been strong. what began 1903 with the first channel induction furnace from asea, continued in 1988 with the merger of asea and bbc - their knowledge and know-how - into the company abb. with these roots the foundry systems business of abb became abp induction in the year 2005 as an independent, world wide operating company. the abp induction group today focuses on sales and service in all major industrial regions from 10 locations around the globe: germany, sweden, russia, usa, mexico, brazil, china, india, thailand, japan.
business_tags: machinery | induction heating | machinery manufacturing | induction furnace | metal casting
generated_description: abp induction is a global manufacturer of industrial induction heating and melting equipment for the metal casting and forging industries. with over 100 years of experience, the company has a strong focus on molten metal and has been serving the industry since 1903. in 2005, abp indence became an independent, worldwide operating company, drawing on the expertise and knowledge of the foundry systems business of abb. today, abb induction operates from 10 locations worldwide, serving major industrial regions including germany, sweden, russia, usa, mexico, brazil, china, india, thailand, and japan.
